description: The GS1 Web Vocabulary collects terms defined in various GS1 standards and data systems and made available for general use following Linked Data principles. It is designed as an extension to schema.org and, where relevant, mappings and relationships arising from that vocabulary are made explicit.
label: GS1 Web Vocabulary

AdditionalProductClassificationDetails.description: A product classification for the product other than the Global Product Classification(GPC brick value).
AdditionalProductClassificationDetails.label: Additional Product Classification Details

AdditiveDetails.description: A set of details about one of the additives within the product.
AdditiveDetails.label: Additive Details

AllergenDetails.description: Details of an allergen for a product.
AllergenDetails.label: Allergen Details

AuthenticityDetails.description: A set of details about covert or overt security features that may contribute to checking the authenticity of a product or product instance.
AuthenticityDetails.label: Authenticity Details

AwardPrizeDetails.description: Describes a prize or award won by a product or organization.
AwardPrizeDetails.label: Award Prize

FoodBeverageTobaccoProduct.description: A food, beverage or tobacco product.
FoodBeverageTobaccoProduct.label: Food Beverage Tobacco Product

Brand.description: Information on brands and sub-brands for a product.
Brand.label: Brand

CertificationDetails.description: Certification issued by a certifying body to a certification subject (Organization, Place, Product).
CertificationDetails.label: Certification

Clothing.description: A product that is worn on the body.
Clothing.label: Clothing

WearableProduct.description: Products that are worn on the body.
WearableProduct.label: Wearable Product

ColourCodeDetails.description: A set of colour code details (colour code, party controlling the code list) for the product.
ColourCodeDetails.label: Colour Code Details

ContactPoint.description: Information on an individual or department acting as point of contact for an organiation.
ContactPoint.label: Contact

Country.description: Country is a complex data type that indicates a country and a country subdivision.
Country.label: Country

DietTypeCodeDetails.description: A set of diet type code details (diet type code and diet type sub code) for the product.
DietTypeCodeDetails.label: Diet Type Code Details

Discount.description: Provides information on a discount applicable to an offer for example 2 percent.
Discount.label: Discount

FoodAndBeveragePreparationInformation.description: Food and Beverage Preparation Information is a complex data type that indicates a preparation state code and preparation instructions.
FoodAndBeveragePreparationInformation.label: Food and Beverage Preparation Information

FoodBeverageTobaccoIngredientDetails.description: Food Beverage Tobacco Ingredient is a complex data type that includes an ingredient statement and details.
FoodBeverageTobaccoIngredientDetails.label: Food Beverage Tobacco Ingredient

Product.description: Any item (product or service) upon which there is a need to retrieve pre-defined information and that may be priced, or ordered, or invoiced at any point in any supply chain.
Product.label: Product

Footwear.description: Outerwear that is worn on the feet such as shoes or boots.
Footwear.label: Footwear

FruitsVegetables.description: Contains properties related specifically to fruit and vegetable products.
FruitsVegetables.label: Fruits and Vegetables

GeoCoordinates.description: The geographic coordinates of a place or event.
GeoCoordinates.label: GeoCoordinates

GeoShape.description: The geographic shape of a place. A GeoShape can be described using several properties whose values are based on latitude/longitude pairs. Either whitespace or commas can be used to separate latitude and longitude; whitespace should be used when writing a list of several such points.
GeoShape.label: GeoShape

LocationID_Details.description: Government bodies, trade organisations, and other parties issue identifiers that are associated to locations. Linking these identifiers to GLN and one another supports consolidating records, mapping related, collaborative identifiers, enhances search ability and enables more efficient transitions between identifiers.  This class provides a mechanism for connecting and sharing location identifiers.
LocationID_Details.label: Location ID Details

LocationStatusHistory.description: Over the lifetime of a location, it may go through periods of being active and inactive. gs1:LocationStatusHistory allows changes in status to be communicated in advance and tracked over time.
LocationStatusHistory.label: Location Status History

MilkButterCreamYogurtCheeseEggsSubstitut.description: Milk butter cream yogurts cheese eggs and any substitutes for these products.
MilkButterCreamYogurtCheeseEggsSubstitut.label: Milk Butter Cream Yogurt Cheese Eggs Substitutes

NutritionMeasurementType.description: A class providing nutritional value and intake percent.
NutritionMeasurementType.label: Nutrition Measurement Type

QuantitativeValue.description: A point value or interval for product characteristics and other purposes. A unit of measurement is also specified.
QuantitativeValue.label: Measurement Type

Offer.description: An offer to transfer some rights to an item or to provide a service,for example, an offer to sell tickets to an event, to rent the DVD of a movie, to stream a TV show over the internet, to repair a motorcycle, or to loan a book.
Offer.label: Offer

OrganicClaimDetails.description: A set of organic claim details for the product.
OrganicClaimDetails.label: Organic Claim Details

Organization.description: An Organization is any legal or physical entity involved at any point in any supply chain and upon which there is a need to retrieve predefined information. An Organization is uniquely identified by a Global Location Number (GLN).
Organization.label: Organization

OrganizationID_Details.description: Government bodies, trade organisations, and other parties issue identifiers that are associated to legal entities and/or functions. Linking these identifiers to GLN and one another supports consolidating records, mapping related, collaborative identifiers, enhances search ability and enables more efficient transitions between identifiers.  This class provides a mechanism for connecting and sharing party identifiers.
OrganizationID_Details.label: Organisation ID Details

OrganizationStatusHistory.description: Over the lifetime of an organisation, it may go through periods of being active and inactive. gs1:OrganizationStatusHistory allows changes in status to be communicated in advance and tracked over time.
OrganizationStatusHistory.label: Organisation Status History

PackagingDetails.description: Details on packaging for a product for example packaging type (bottle), materials, features, recycling, etc..
PackagingDetails.label: Packaging

PackagingMaterialDetails.description: Information on any material used for packaging.
PackagingMaterialDetails.label: Packaging Material Details

Place.description: Entities that have a somewhat fixed, physical location.
Place.label: Place

PostalAddress.description: The location at which a particular organization or person may be found or reached.
PostalAddress.label: Address

PriceSpecification.description: A structured value representing a monetary amount, consisting of a value and currency code.
PriceSpecification.label: Price Specification

ProductYieldDetails.description: A grouping of properties related to the yield of a food or beverage product according to a specified type of preparation.
ProductYieldDetails.label: Product Yield Details

ReferencedFileDetails.description: Provides URL and other information on a referenced electronic file.
ReferencedFileDetails.label: Referenced File

ReturnablePackageDepositDetails.description: Details of the deposit for returnable packaging for a product.
ReturnablePackageDepositDetails.label: Returnable Package Deposit Details

Seafood.description: Seafood Products including fish and shellfish.
Seafood.label: Seafood

SizeCodeDetails.description: A grouping of properties related to the representing the size of a product, by specifying a value from a specified code list.
SizeCodeDetails.label: Size Code Details

SizeDetails.description: A grouping of properties related to the size of a wearable product
SizeDetails.label: Size Details

TargetMarketDetails.description: A set of target market details (product release date and associated countries) for the product.
TargetMarketDetails.label: Target Market Details

TextileMaterialDetails.description: Details on the composition of any materials used to make a product using textiles.
TextileMaterialDetails.label: Textile Material

WarrantyPromise.description: An assurance that the product is reliable and that repairs or replacement will be done free of charge within a given time limit and under certain conditions in the event of a defect.
WarrantyPromise.label: Warranty

originalCodeValue.description: Links to the alphanumeric code value defined elsewhere in GS1 or the GS1 Global Data Dictionary
originalCodeValue.label: Original Code Value

acceptedPaymentMethod.description: Code indicating a means of payment, for example, BANK_CHEQUE, CASH, etc.
acceptedPaymentMethod.label: Accepted Payment Method

activityIdeas.description: A link to ideas for using a product or engaging in other forms of entertainment, particularly with children.
activityIdeas.label: Activity Ideas

linkType.description: Provides a URL for related information or services. This is not expected to be used directly but provides a super property for all other link types in the GS1 ecosystem.
linkType.label: Link Type

additionalLocationID.description: Location identifiers assigned and managed by government bodies, trade organisations, and other entities.
additionalLocationID.label: Has Additional Location ID

additionalOrganizationID.description: Party/organisation identifiers assigned and managed by government bodies, trade organisations, and other entities.
additionalOrganizationID.label: Has Additional Organization ID

additionalOrganizationIdentificationType.description: The value associated with the Additional Organization Identification Type Value.
additionalOrganizationIdentificationType.label: Additional Organization Identification Type Value

additionalProductClassification.description: Relates to a set of additional product classification details
additionalProductClassification.label: Has Additional Product Classification

additionalProductClassificationCode.description: Code specifying the applied additional product classification scheme.
additionalProductClassificationCode.label: Additional Product Classification Code

additionalProductClassificationCodeDescr.description: A description related to  the additional product classification code value.
additionalProductClassificationCodeDescr.label: Additional Product Classification Code Description

additionalProductClassificationValue.description: Code specifying an additional product classification other than the GS1 Global Product Classification. The applied classification scheme is specified as additional information together with the classification value.
additionalProductClassificationValue.label: Additional Product Classification Value

additionalProductDescription.description: Additional variants necessary to communicate to the industry to help define the product. Multiple variants can be established for each GTIN for e.g. Style, Colour, and Fragrance .
additionalProductDescription.label: Additional Product Description

additive.description: Relates to details about any additives that a product may contain.
additive.label: Has Additive

additiveLevelOfContainment.description: Code indicating the level of presence of the additive.
additiveLevelOfContainment.label: Additive Level Of Containment

additiveName.description: The name of any additive or genetic modification contained or not contained in the product .
additiveName.label: Additive Name

address.description: The postal address for an organization or place.
address.label: Has Postal Address

addressCountry.description: Code specifying the country (and country subdivision) for the address using ISO 3166-1.
addressCountry.label: Address Country

addressLocality.description: Text specifying the name of the locality, for example a city.
addressLocality.label: Address Locality

addressRegion.description: Text specifying a province or state in abbreviated format for example NJ.
addressRegion.label: Province State Code

addressSuburb.description: A suburb within a town or city.
addressSuburb.label: Address Suburb

afterHoursContact.description: Links to after-hours contact information. For general contact details, gs1:contactPoint SHALL be used.
afterHoursContact.label: Has After Hours Contact

contactPoint.description: Contact information. To specify a contact specifically designated for after-hours support, see gs1:afterHoursContact
contactPoint.label: Has Business Contact

alcoholicBeverageSubregion.description: A legally defined geographical region where the grapes for a wine were grown also known as an appellation. It is recommended to populate this property with an ISO 3166-2 code to indicate country and subdivision.
alcoholicBeverageSubregion.label: Alcoholic Beverage Sub-region

allergenInfo.description: A link to a description of the allergen information.
allergenInfo.label: Allergen information

allergenLevelOfContainmentCode.description: Code specifying the level of presence of the allergen.
allergenLevelOfContainmentCode.label: Allergen Level Of Containment

allergenSpecificationAgency.description: The agency or other organization that defines or manages the criteria for allergen containment.
allergenSpecificationAgency.label: Allergen Specification Agency

allergenSpecificationName.description: Free text field containing the name and version of the regulation or standard that defines the criteria of allergen containment.
allergenSpecificationName.label: Allergen Specification Name

allergenStatement.description: Textual description of the presence or absence of allergens as governed by local rules and regulations, specified as one string.
allergenStatement.label: Allergen Statement

allergenType.description: Code specifying the type of allergen.
allergenType.label: Allergen Type Code

anatomicalForm.description: Describes the meat product in terms of whether it is the whole animal or part of the animal which has been cut such as the muscle, bone, organ, or fat.
anatomicalForm.label: Anatomical Form

applicableTo.description: A property linking a gs1:linkType to the primary GS1 key(s) for which it can be used. Similar to rdfs:Domain but the value space is a GS1 Application Identifier, not a class.
applicableTo.label: Applicable to

audioFile.description: Link to a file containing an audio clip which is relevant to the product. Examples are commercials, or instructional/ how to use audio files.
audioFile.label: Has Audio File

authenticity.description: Links to details of covert/overt security markings that may be used to check authenticity of a product instance.
authenticity.label: Has Authenticity Details

authenticitySecurityFeatureInstructions.description: Provides human-readable instructions about how to locate a physical security marking and read a value from it.
authenticitySecurityFeatureInstructions.label: Authenticity Security Feature Instructions

authenticitySecurityFeatureInstructionsU.description: Links to online instructions about how to locate a physical security marking and read a value from it.
authenticitySecurityFeatureInstructionsU.label: Authenticity Security Feature Instructions Link

authenticitySecurityFeatureRegularExpres.description: Links to a regular expression to be used to perform syntax validation (plausibility checking) of a string value read from a physical security marking.
authenticitySecurityFeatureRegularExpres.label: Authenticity Security Feature Regular Expression

authenticitySecurityFeatureType.description: Links to a URI code value indicating a particular type of physical security marking.
authenticitySecurityFeatureType.label: Authenticity Security Feature Type

authenticitySecurityFeatureValue.description: Links to a string value read from a physical security marking.
authenticitySecurityFeatureValue.label: Authenticity Security Feature Value

availabilityEnds.description: The date from which the product is no longer available from the information provider, including seasonal or temporary product and services .
availabilityEnds.label: Availability Ends

availabilityStarts.description: The date from which the product is available from the information provider, including seasonal or temporary product and services.
availabilityStarts.label: Availability Starts

availableAtOrFrom.description: The location the offered product or service is available from.
availableAtOrFrom.label: Available At/From

availableLanguage.description: ISO 639-1 code specifying the language of a specified contact point.
availableLanguage.label: Available Language

awardPrize.description: An award or prize given to the product.
awardPrize.label: Has Award Prize

awardPrizeCode.description: Indicates the achievement of the product in relation to a prize or award, e.g. winner, runner-up, shortlisted.
awardPrizeCode.label: Award Prize Code

awardPrizeCountryCode.description: An ISO standard code identifying the country in which a prize or award is given. It is recommended to populate this property with an ISO 3166-1 country code.
awardPrizeCountryCode.label: Award Prize Country Code

awardPrizeDescription.description: Text that describes the awards won.
awardPrizeDescription.label: Award Prize Description

awardPrizeJury.description: Free text listing members of the jury that awarded the prize.
awardPrizeJury.label: Award Prize Jury

awardPrizeName.description: The name of a prize or award which the product has received.
awardPrizeName.label: Award Prize Name

awardPrizeYear.description: The year in which a prize or award was given.
awardPrizeYear.label: Award Prize Year

baseLocation.description: A fixed physical location where a mobile location most commonly resides. If gs1:glnType is present, gs1:baseLocationGLN SHALL only be used when gs1:glnType is gs1:GLN_TypeCode-MOBILE_PHYSICAL_LOCATION
baseLocation.label: Base Location

bestBeforeDate.description: Best before date on the label or package signifies the end of the period under which the product will retain specific quality attributes or claims even though the product may continue to retain positive quality attributes after this date. Best before date is primarily used for consumer information and may be a regulatory requirement.

beverageVintage.description: The year in which the majority of ingredients are harvested and/or the alcoholic beverage is produced. Determination as to whether the vintage year is the harvest date or production date is according to requirements in the Target Market.
beverageVintage.label: Beverage Vintage

biotinPerNutrientBasis.description: Biotin Acid per specified nutrient basis quantity.
biotinPerNutrientBasis.label: Biotin Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

bonelessClaim.description: The descriptive term that is used by the product manufacturer to identify whether the product makes a specific claim to contain no bones.
bonelessClaim.label: Boneless Claim

brand.description: The brand of the product that appears on the consumer package.
brand.label: Has Brand

brandHomepageClinical.description: A link to a brand presence aimed at clinical professionals.
brandHomepageClinical.label: Information for professionals about this brand

brandHomepagePatient.description: A link to a brand presence aimed at patients.
brandHomepagePatient.label: Information for patients about this brand

brandName.description: The brand name of the product that appears on the consumer package.
brandName.label: Brand Name

brandOwner.description: The brand owner of the product. The organization that is responsible for allocating the GTIN to the product.
brandOwner.label: Has Brand Owner

calciumPerNutrientBasis.description: Calcium per specified nutrient basis quantity.
calciumPerNutrientBasis.label: Calcium Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

carbohydratesPerNutrientBasis.description: Carbohydrates per specified nutrient basis quantity.
carbohydratesPerNutrientBasis.label: Carbohydrates Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

careersInfo.description: A link to information about jobs, careers, or other employment opportunities associated to an organisation or location.
careersInfo.label: Careers information

catchZone.description: Free text field describing the sea zone from which the product was caught in.
catchZone.label: Catch Zone

certification.description: Certification information about a product, organisation or location.
certification.label: Has Certification

certificationAgency.description: Name of the organisation issuing the certification standard or other requirement being met .
certificationAgency.label: Certification Agency

certificationAgencyURL.description: URL of the organisation issuing the certification standard or other requirement being met. e.g. https://www.msc.org , https://www.fsc.org
certificationAgencyURL.label: Certification Agency URL

certificationAuditDate.description: Date of completion of the auditing needed for certification
certificationAuditDate.label: Certification Audit Date

certificationEndDate.description: Last date of validity for the certification. (After this date the certification lapses and would need to be renewed/replaced)
certificationEndDate.label: Certification End Date

certificationIdentification.description: A reference (i.e, to a certificate instance) issued to confirm that a product, party or location has passed certification. e.g. 'XSC-C-12345'
certificationIdentification.label: Certification Identification

certificationStandard.description: Name of the certification standard. Free text. Example: 'Egg classification' .
certificationStandard.label: Certification Standard

certificationStartDate.description: First date of validity for the certification
certificationStartDate.label: Certification Start Date

certificationStatement.description: Certification scope statement of the individual certification instance. The same certificationStandard can be issued with different values of certificationStatement in different instances.
certificationStatement.label: Certification Statement

certificationStatus.description: Indicates the current status of the certification, e.g. active or inactive.
certificationStatus.label: Certification Status

certificationSubject.description: References the object (e.g. product, asset, container), party or location being certified. If multiple values are specified, the certification details apply to the logical conjunction (AND) of groups of different types, while a logical disjunction (OR) applies within each group of the same type. For example, two sibling organisations O1 and O2 can process products P1 and P2 at locations L1 and L2: meaning that either organisation can process either product at either location (OR); but the certificate holds for the combinations of organisation (either O1 OR O2) AND product (either P1 OR P2) AND location (either L1 OR L2)
certificationSubject.label: Certification Subject

certificationURI.description: If gs1:certificationURI is present, it should point to data about this individual certificate within a repository maintained by the certification agency.
certificationURI.label: Certification URI

cheeseFirmness.description: The firmness of the cheese product for example EXTRA_HARD.
cheeseFirmness.label: Cheese Firmness

cheeseMaturationPeriodDescription.description: A descriptive way to specify a date range as some cheeses are matured over a period of time, but not an exact period. For example 3 to 4 weeks, over 1 year etc. The term maturation is also known in other markets as Aged.
cheeseMaturationPeriodDescription.label: Cheese Maturation Period Description

chloridePerNutrientBasis.description: Chloride per specified nutrient basis quantity.
chloridePerNutrientBasis.label: Chloride Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

cholesterolPerNutrientBasis.description: Cholesterol per specified nutrient basis quantity.
cholesterolPerNutrientBasis.label: Cholesterol Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

chromiumPerNutrientBasis.description: Chromium per specified nutrient basis quantity.
chromiumPerNutrientBasis.label: Chromium Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

circle.description: A circle is the circular region of a specified radius centred at a specified latitude and longitude. A circle is expressed as a pair followed by a radius in meters.
circle.label: Circle

clothingCut.description: Supplemental information to indicate the clothing cut or silhouette make of the garment. For example, silhouette details for a pair of jeans such as boot cut, or loose fit, comfort fit.
clothingCut.label: Clothing Cut

collarType.description: A free text description of the type of collar on the garment.
collarType.label: Collar Type

colourCode.description: Relates to a set of details about the colour code for a product
colourCode.label: Has Colour Code

colourCodeList.description: The parties controlling the colour code lists. Dependent on colour code value.
colourCodeList.label: Colour Code List

colourCodeValue.description: A code indicating the colour of an object according to a specific code list. The applied code list is specified as additional information together with the colour code.
colourCodeValue.label: Colour Code

colourDescription.description: A description of the colour of an object.
colourDescription.label: Colour Description

consumerFirstAvailabilityDateTime.description: The first date/time that the buyer is allowed to sell the product to consumers. Usually related to a specific geography. ISO 8601 date format CCYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.
consumerFirstAvailabilityDateTime.label: Consumer First Availability Date Time

consumerHandlingStorage.description: Link to a website, file, or image containing the manufacturer's recommendations for how the consumer or end user should store and handle the product.
consumerHandlingStorage.label: Has Consumer Handling Storage

consumerHandlingStorageInfo.description: A link to information about safe handling and storage for consumer use.
consumerHandlingStorageInfo.label: Consumer handling and storage information

consumerLifestage.description: Indicates, with reference to the product branding, labelling or packaging, the descriptive term that is used by the product manufacturer to identify the period or stage in the consumer's life during which the product is considered to be suitable.
consumerLifestage.label: Consumer Lifestage

consumerPackageDisclaimer.description: Additional information that should be used in advertising and in displaying.
consumerPackageDisclaimer.label: Consumer Package Disclaimer

consumerProductVariant.description: The consumer product variant may be used to distinguish one variant of a retail consumer trade item from another if the change does not require the allocation of a different Global Trade Item Number (per the GTIN Management Standard), but communication between trading partners is required to support consumers. The brand owner is responsible for assigning the consumer product variant.

consumerSafetyInformation.description: Information on consumer safety regarding the product.
consumerSafetyInformation.label: Consumer Safety Information

consumerSalesCondition.description: A code indicating restrictions imposed on the product regarding how it can be sold to the consumer for example Prescription Required.
consumerSalesCondition.label: Consumer Sales Condition Code

consumerStorageInstructions.description: Expresses in text the consumer storage instructions of a product which are normally held on the label or accompanying the product. This information may or may not be labelled on the pack.
consumerStorageInstructions.label: Consumer Storage Instructions

consumerUsageInstructions.description: Free text containing the usage instructions of a product, which are normally held on the label or accompanying the product. This information may or may not be labelled on the pack.
consumerUsageInstructions.label: Consumer Usage Instructions

contactTitle.description: The job title of the person that can be contacted for example Manager.
contactTitle.label: Contact Title

contactType.description: The function or role of a contact for example Customer Support.
contactType.label: Contact Type

containedInPlace.description: Designates the larger physical location a sub-location is located within. To specify sub-locations of a physical location, see gs1:containsPlace.
containedInPlace.label: Contained in Place

containsPlace.description: Designates a sub-location (e.g., floor, room, shelf) within the physical location being identified. There may be multiple sub-locations associated to a single, physical location. To specify the larger physical location the sub-location is located within, see gs1:containedInPlace
containsPlace.label: Contains Place

convenienceLevelPercent.description: An indication of the ease of preparation for semi-prepared products. The convenience level indicates the level of preparation in percentage required to prepare and helps the consumer to assess how long it will take to prepare the meal.
convenienceLevelPercent.label: Convenience Level Percent

coordinateReferenceSystem.description: Open standard spatial reference systems or coordinate reference systems that provide coordinate-based local, regional or global system used to locate geographical entities.  Values should be URIs already defined by the IOPG Geomatics Committee (https://epsg.org/), such as https://epsg.io/4326 (WGS84); https://epsg.io/4267 (NAD27); https://epsg.io/4230 (ED50); https://epsg.io/4618 (SAD69); https://epsg.io/4269 (NAD83).  For elevation values, gs1:elevation SHALL be used.
coordinateReferenceSystem.label: Coordinate Reference System

copperPerNutrientBasis.description: Copper per specified nutrient basis quantity.
copperPerNutrientBasis.label: Copper Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

countryCode.description: A short text string code (see values defined in ISO 3166) specifying the country in which a processing or other activity is performed, for example processing, bottling, manufacturing.
countryCode.label: Country Code

countryOfAssembly.description: The place where product is assembled.
countryOfAssembly.label: Has Country Of Assembly

countryOfLastProcessing.description: The place where the product or ingredient was last processed and tested before importation.
countryOfLastProcessing.label: Has Country Of Last Processing

countryOfOrigin.description: Code indicating the country of origin of the product.
countryOfOrigin.label: Has Country Of Origin

countryOfOriginStatement.description: A description of the geographic area the item may have originated from or has been processed.
countryOfOriginStatement.label: Country Of Origin Statement

countrySubdivisionCode.description: A short text string code (see values defined in ISO 3166_2) specifying the country subdivision in which an activity is performed, for example processing, bottling, manufacturing.
countrySubdivisionCode.label: Country Subdivision Code

countyCode.description: A code that identifies a county. A county is a territorial division in some countries, forming the chief unit of local administration. In the US, a county is a political and administrative division of a state.
countyCode.label: County Code

crossStreet.description: A street intersecting a main street (usually at right angles) and continuing on both sides of it.
crossStreet.label: Cross Street

customerSupportCentre.description: The organization which provides product support to the trading partner organization to which merchandise is sold.
customerSupportCentre.label: Has Customer Support Centre

dailyValueIntakePercent.description: The percentage of the recommended daily intake of a nutrient as recommended by authorities of the target market. Is expressed relative to the serving size and base daily value intake.
dailyValueIntakePercent.label: Daily Value Intake Percent

defaultLink.description: The default link for a given identified item to which a resolver will redirect unless there is information in the request that is a better match.
defaultLink.label: Default link

defaultLinkMulti.description: A set of 'default links' that may be differentiated by information in the HTTP request headers sent to a resolver to enable a better match than the single default link.
defaultLinkMulti.label: Default linkMulti

department.description: The name of a division of an organization dealing with a specific activity
department.label: Department

dependentProprietaryProduct.description: Dependent products are products which are required to make the current product functional.
dependentProprietaryProduct.label: Has Dependent Proprietary Product

descriptiveSize.description: An alphanumeric size factor the brand owner wishes to communicate to the consumer. IE Jumbo, Capri, Full Length, Maxi.
descriptiveSize.label: Descriptive Size

dietCode.description: Links to multiple pairs of gs1:DietTypeCode and diet type sub code (free-form text string).
dietCode.label: Diet Code

dietType.description: Code indicating the diet the product is suitable for example Kosher.
dietType.label: Diet Type Code

dietTypeDescription.description: Free text for indication of diet not stated in the list of diets.
dietTypeDescription.label: Diet Type Description

dietTypeSubcode.description: Indicates a set of agreements or a certificate name that guarantees the product is permitted in a particular diet. A diet type subcode is a subclassification of a specific diet type. For example, Pareve is a diet type subcode of Kosher.
dietTypeSubcode.label: Diet Type Sub-code

digitalAddress.description: The location reference associated to a digital place. If gs1:glnType is present, SHALL only be associated if the value of gs1:glnType is gs1:GLN_TypeCode-DIGITAL_LOCATION.
digitalAddress.label: Has Digital Address

digitalLocationName.description: The name of a digital place. To specify the name of a physical location, see gs1:physicalLocationName.
digitalLocationName.label: Digital Location Name

discountRepeatsPerMultipleMinimum.description: If specified and set to true, the discount is available for each time the minimum qualifying criteria are met.  This can be used to express '$10 off each $50 spend', which is distinct from a 20% discount because it is quantized in units of spending.
discountRepeatsPerMultipleMinimum.label: Discount Repeats Per Multiple Minimum

discountType.description: A code that specifies the type of payment discount applicable to an offer, for example BOGO.
discountType.label: Discount Type

drainedWeight.description: The weight of the product when drained of its liquid. For example 225 GRM, Jar of pickles in vinegar.
drainedWeight.label: Drained Weight

dueDate.description: The date by which an invoice should be paid. This data element represents an attribute of a payment slip reference number, AI (8020), and a Global Location Number (GLN) of the invoicing party.

durationOfWarranty.description: The time period that the warranty is valid within.
durationOfWarranty.label: Duration Of Warranty

dutyFeeTaxAmount.description: The current tax or duty or fee amount applicable to the product, expressed as a floating-point numeric value that is qualified by the corresponding currency. See also gs1:priceCurrency.
dutyFeeTaxAmount.label: Duty Fee Tax Amount

priceCurrency.description: A string value indicating a currency from ISO 4217 for example USD .
priceCurrency.label: Price Currency

dutyFeeTaxDescription.description: A description of tax type for example Taxes sure les supports audio.
dutyFeeTaxDescription.label: Duty Fee Tax Description

dutyFeeTaxRate.description: The current tax or duty rate percentage applicable to the product.
dutyFeeTaxRate.label: Duty Fee Tax Rate

elevation.description: The elevation of a location (WGS 84). Values may be of the form 'NUMBER UNITOFMEASUREMENT' (e.g., '1,000 m', '3,200 ft') while numbers alone SHALL be a value in meters.
elevation.label: Elevation

eligibleQuantity.description: The quantity including unit of measure for which the offer for good or service is valid.  If this is not specified, an eligible quantity of 1 should be assumed.
eligibleQuantity.label: Eligible Quantity

eligibleQuantityMaximum.description: The maximum quantity including unit of measure for which the offer for good or service is valid.
eligibleQuantityMaximum.label: Eligible Quantity Maximum

eligibleQuantityMinimum.description: The minimum quantity including unit of measure for which the offer for good or service is valid.
eligibleQuantityMinimum.label: Eligible Quantity Minimum

eligibleTradeChannel.description: A code determining the location where a user can redeem the offer, for example ONLINE_ONLY.
eligibleTradeChannel.label: Eligible Trade Channel

email.description: Creating/sending/receiving of unstructured free text messages or documents using computer network, a mini-computer or an attached modem and regular telephone line or other electronic transmission media.
email.label: E-mail

energyFromFatPerNutrientBasis.description: Energy from Fat per specified nutrient basis quantity.
energyFromFatPerNutrientBasis.label: Energy from Fat Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

energyPerNutrientBasis.description: Energy Per specified nutrient basis quantity.
energyPerNutrientBasis.label: Energy Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

epcis.description: A link to an EPCIS repository of visibility event data.
epcis.label: EPC Information Services (EPCIS) repository

epil.description: A link to an electronic patient information leaflet.
epil.label: Electronic Patient Information Leaflet

equivalentProduct.description: A product which can be substituted for the product based on supplier-defined functional equivalence to the product.
equivalentProduct.label: Has Equivalent Product

eventsInfo.description: A link to event details.  For a page specifically for scheduling a reservation or booking an appointment, see gs1:scheduleTime.
eventsInfo.label: Events information

exactDiscountAmount.description: Links to a gs1:PriceSpecification that indicates in terms of an amount and specified currency, the exact discount on the sales price associated with a particular gs1:Discount. This property can be used to express '$10 off'.
exactDiscountAmount.label: Exact Discount Amount

exactDiscountPercentage.description: A floating-point value indicating an exact percentage discount on the sales price associated with a particular gs1:Discount.  This property can be used to express '15% discount'.
exactDiscountPercentage.label: Exact Discount Percentage

exclusionDescription.description: A text description of any products, brands, or categories that cannot be used with the offer
exclusionDescription.label: Exclusion Description

expirationDate.description: The expiration date is the date that determines the limit of consumption or use of a product/coupon. Its meaning is determined based on the trade item context (e.g., for food, the date will indicate the possibility of a direct health risk resulting from use of the product after the date, for pharmaceutical products, it will indicate the possibility of an indirect health risk resulting from the ineffectiveness of the product after the date). It is often referred to as 'use by date' or 'maximum durability date'.

expirationDateTime.description: The manufacturer determines the expiration date and time, which is relevant only for short duration and for items that will not be sent on long distances and not outside of the time zone. A typical application of AI (7003) is in hospitals or public pharmacies for special, customised, products which may have a 'life duration' shorter than one single day. The life duration varies according the pharmaceutical substances used in the treatment. The precise expiration date and time is defined at the end of the manufacturing process, and can be barcoded on the product label as an attribute to the item's GTIN. Where there is no business requirement to express the expiration date to the nearest hour (or less), AI (17) Expiration date should be used.

faqs.description: A link to a set of frequently asked questions.
faqs.label: Frequently Asked Questions

fatInMilkContent.description: The percentage of fat contained in milk content of the product.
fatInMilkContent.label: Fat In Milk Content

fatPerNutrientBasis.description: Fat per specified nutrient basis quantity.
fatPerNutrientBasis.label: Fat Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

fatpercentageInDryMatter.description: The amount of fat contained in the base product expressed in percentage.
fatpercentageInDryMatter.label: Fat In Dry Matter

faxNumber.description: A fax number used for transmitting and reproducing fixed graphic material over telephone lines or other electronic transmission media.
faxNumber.label: Telefax

fibrePerNutrientBasis.description: Fibre per specified nutrient basis quantity.
fibrePerNutrientBasis.label: Fibre Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

fileLanguageCode.description: The specified language to which the digital asset is targeted. It is recommended to use the ISO 639-1 language code.
fileLanguageCode.label: File Language Code

filePixelHeight.description: The number of pixels along the vertical axis of the image.
filePixelHeight.label: File Pixel Height

filePixelWidth.description: The number of pixels along the horizontal axis of the image.
filePixelWidth.label: File Pixel Width

firstFreezeDate.description: The first freeze date is applicable to products that are frozen directly after slaughtering, harvesting, catching or after initial processing of the product. Examples include fresh meat, meat products or fishery products. The first freeze date is determined by the organisation conducting the freezing.

fishType.description: The type of fish for example Sea bass.
fishType.label: Fish Type

fluoridePerNutrientBasis.description: Fluoride per specified nutrient basis quantity.
fluoridePerNutrientBasis.label: Fluoride Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

folicAcidPerNutrientBasis.description: Folic Acid per specified nutrient basis quantity.
folicAcidPerNutrientBasis.label: Folic Acid Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

foodBeverageRefrigerationClaim.description: Identifies whether or not the product requires refrigeration.
foodBeverageRefrigerationClaim.label: Food Beverage Refrigeration Claim

foodBeverageTargetUse.description: The type of meal the food or beverage product is targeted to for example Breakfast.
foodBeverageTargetUse.label: Food Beverage Target Use

footwearFasteningType.description: Something that mechanically joins or affixes two or more parts together in a footwear product for example a shoe lace.
footwearFasteningType.label: Fastening Type

footwearUpperType.description: The descriptive term that is used by the product manufacturer to identify whether the footwear upper is open or closed. Otherwise known as Open or Closed Upper.
footwearUpperType.label: Footwear Upper Type

freshOrSeawaterFarmed.description: A code determining whether the fish originated from the sea or was farmed.
freshOrSeawaterFarmed.label: Fresh or Seawater Farmed

functionalName.description: Describes use of the product or service by the consumer. Should help clarify the product classification associated with the GTIN.
functionalName.label: Functional Name

geneticallyModifiedDeclaration.description: A statement of the presence or absence of genetically modified protein or DNA.
geneticallyModifiedDeclaration.label: Genetically Modified Declaration Code

geo.description: Links to information about geocoordinates or geoshapes for a place.
geo.label: Has Geocoordinates

glnType.description: Indicates what type of thing is being identified by a GLN.
glnType.label: Has GLN Type

globalLocationNumber.description: A Global Location Number (GLN) is the GS1 Identification Key used to identify physical locations or parties. The key comprises a GS1 Company Prefix, Location Reference and Check Digit. For more information see https://www.gs1.org/gln.
globalLocationNumber.label: Global Location Number (GLN)

gpcCategoryCode.description: 8-digit code (GPC Brick Value) specifying a product category according to the GS1 Global Product Classification (GPC) standard. For more information see https://www.gs1.org/gpc
gpcCategoryCode.label: GPC Category Code

gpcCategoryDescription.description: A description of the code specifying a product category according to the GS1 Global Product Classification (GPC) standard.
gpcCategoryDescription.label: GPC Category Description

grossArea.description: The overall area of the item including packaging. This can be given using a number of different AI ranges that depend on the units in which the area is measured.
grossArea.label: 334n, 353n, 354n, 355n

grossVolume.description: The overall volume of the item including packaging. This can be given using a number of different AI ranges that depend on the units in which the volume is measured.
grossVolume.label: 335n, 336n, 362n, 363n, 367n, 368n, 369n

grossWeight.description: Used to identify the gross weight of the product. The gross weight includes all packaging materials of the product. At pallet level the productGrossWeight includes the weight of the pallet itself. For example, 200 GRM, value - total pounds, total grams, etc.
grossWeight.label: Gross Weight

growingMethod.description: The process through which fresh produce is grown and cultivated.
growingMethod.label: Growing Method

gtin.description: A Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) is the 14 digit GS1 Identification Key used to identify products. The key comprises a GS1 Company Prefix followed by an Item Reference Number and a Check Digit. See https://www.gs1.org/gtin  for more details.

handledBy.description: Used when one resolver redirects all request URIs that match a given pattern without further processing, such as from GS1 to a brand-operated service. See section 7.7.1 of the Digital Link standard, version 1.1.
handledBy.label: Handled by

harvestDate.description: The harvest date. For example, the harvest date can be the date when an animal was slaughtered or killed, a fish has been harvested, or a crop was harvested. This date  is determined by the organisation conducting the harvesting. Different organisations may use more specific terminology when referring to their specific needs and use terms such as: Date of catch or slaughter date.

harvestDateEnd.description: The harvest end date. For example, the harvest end date can be the date when an animal was slaughtered or killed, a fish has been harvested, or a crop was harvested. This end date is determined by the organisation conducting the harvesting. Different organisations may use more specific terminology when referring to their specific needs and use terms such as: Date of catch or slaughter date. When referring to animals the date range refers to the whole animal and all meat or fish cuts derived from this animal.

harvestDateStart.description: The harvest start date. For example, the harvest start date can be the date when an animal was slaughtered or killed, a fish has been harvested, or a crop was harvested. This start date is determined by the organisation conducting the harvesting. Different organisations may use more specific terminology when referring to their specific needs and use terms such as: Date of catch or slaughter date. When referring to animals the date range refers to the whole animal and all meat or fish cuts derived from this animal.

hasBatchLotNumber.description: The batch or lot number associates an item with information the manufacturer considers relevant for traceability of the trade item to which the element string is applied. The data may refer to the trade item itself or to items contained. The number may be, for example, a production lot number, a shift number, a machine number, a time, or an internal production code. In cases where the same product is manufactured in different locations the brand owner and the manufacturer are responsible for ensuring the non-duplication of batch/lot numbers for a GTIN. For the re-use of batch/lot numbers with a GTIN, sector-specific constraints need to be considered.

hasPrimaryLocation.description: Links to the place(s) that this organisation designates as their primary location(s).
hasPrimaryLocation.label: Has primary location

hasRetailers.description: A link to a list of retailers.
hasRetailers.label: Has Retailers

hasReturnablePackageDeposit.description: links to details of amounts refunded for returnable package in a specified region.
hasReturnablePackageDeposit.label: Has Returnable Package Deposit Details

hasSerialNumber.description: A serial number is assigned to an entity for its lifetime. When combined with a GTIN, a serial number uniquely identifies an individual item. The serial number field is alphanumeric and may include all characters contained in figure 7.11-1. The brand owner and the manufacturer are responsible for ensuring the non-duplication of serial numbers for a GTIN. For the re-use of serial numbers with a GTIN, sector-specific constraints need to be considered.

hasThirdPartyControlledSerialNumber.description: This identifier is assigned to an entity for its lifetime. When combined with a GTIN, a TPX uniquely identifies an individual item and forms a unit pack Unique Identifier (upUI) for tobacco traceability per EU 2018/574. The serial number field is alphanumeric and may include all characters contained in figure 7.11-1. The Third Party determines the TPX, but the TPX shall begin with the ID Issuer Unique Identification Code (UIC), followed by GS1 UIC Extension 1, and GS1 UIC Extension 2.

healthClaimDescription.description: A description of health claims according to regulations of the target market.
healthClaimDescription.label: Health Claim

homepage.description: A link to general information about an organisation or brand. Typically the homepage of an organisation's website. It may include links to further information such as certifications, careers, payments, reservations, etc.
homepage.label: Organisation Information Page

image.description: Link to a file containing a visual representation of the product.
image.label: Has Product Image

inPackageDepth.description: The depth of the product in its packaging, as measured according to the GS1 Package Measurement Rules. See https://www.gs1.org/package-measurement-rules-implementation-guide for more details.
inPackageDepth.label: In Package Depth

inPackageDiameter.description: The measurement of the diameter of the product in its package at its largest point. For example, 165 MMT.
inPackageDiameter.label: In Package Diameter

inPackageHeight.description: The height of the product in the package, as measured according to the GS1 Package Measurement Rules. See https://www.gs1.org/package-measurement-rules-implementation-guide for more details.
inPackageHeight.label: In Package Height

inPackageWidth.description: The width of the product in the package, as measured according to the GS1 Package Measurement Rules. See https://www.gs1.org/package-measurement-rules-implementation-guide for more details.
inPackageWidth.label: In Package Width

includedAccessories.description: Any included object or device not part of the core product itself but which adds to its functionality or use.
includedAccessories.label: Included Accessories

ingredient.description: Links to information about ingredients of a specific Food/Beverage/Tobacco product.
ingredient.label: Has Food And Beverage Ingredient Information

ingredientContentPercentage.description: Quantity of the ingredient contained in the product as a percentage of the total product ingredients. This is used in conjunction with ingredientName.
ingredientContentPercentage.label: Ingredient Content Percentage

ingredientName.description: Free text field describing an ingredient or ingredient group. Ingredients include any additives (colourings, preservatives, e-numbers, etc.) that are encompassed.
ingredientName.label: Ingredient Name

ingredientOfConcern.description: Indicates a claim to an ingredient, considered to be a concern for regulatory or other reasons, and which is 'contained' within the product but may not need to specify the amount whether approximate, or an accurate measurement be given.
ingredientOfConcern.label: Ingredient of Concern

ingredientSequence.description: Integer (1, 2, 3...) indicating the ingredient order by content percentage of the product. (major ingredient = 1, second ingredient = 2) etc.
ingredientSequence.label: Ingredient Sequence

ingredientStatement.description: Information on the constituent ingredient make up of the product specified as one string.
ingredientStatement.label: Ingredient Statement

ingredientsInfo.description: A link to facts about ingredients.
ingredientsInfo.label: Ingredients information

initialCertificationDate.description: The date when the certification was originally issued. May differ from the certificationStartDate of the current recertification cycle.
initialCertificationDate.label: Initial Certification Date

instructions.description: A link to instructions, such as assembly instructions, usage tips etc.
instructions.label: Instructions

instructionsForUse.description: Link to a file containing the Instructions For Use.
instructionsForUse.label: Has Instructions For Use

iodinePerNutrientBasis.description: Iodine per specified nutrient basis quantity.
iodinePerNutrientBasis.label: Iodine Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

ironPerNutrientBasis.description: Iron per specified nutrient basis quantity.
ironPerNutrientBasis.label: Iron Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

irradiatedCode.description: Indicates if radiation has been applied to the product.
irradiatedCode.label: Irradiated Code

isCarbonated.description: Used to identify whether or not a beverage product is naturally effervescent or has been made effervescent by the addition of carbon dioxide gas.
isCarbonated.label: Is Carbonated

isDecaffeinated.description: The descriptive term that is used by the product manufacturer to identify whether or not the product contains caffeine.
isDecaffeinated.label: Is Decaffeinated

isFromConcentrate.description: Used to identify whether or not the product claims to be made from a concentrated formulation.
isFromConcentrate.label: Is From Concentrate

isHomogenised.description: A The indication whether or not the milk used was actively homogenised. The homogenisation of milk is a technical process in the dairy. The milk fat is milled to such an extent that further creaming is prevented.
isHomogenised.label: Is Homogenised

isInstant.description: Determines whether the product is instant.
isInstant.label: Is Instant

isMaternity.description: Indicates, with reference to the product branding, labelling or packaging, the descriptive term that is used by the product manufacturer to identify if the product is intended as maternity wear.
isMaternity.label: Is Maternity

isOnlyAvailableThroughRetailer.description: If specified and set to true, the discount is only available through the retailer making the offer.
isOnlyAvailableThroughRetailer.label: Only Available Through Retailer

isOnlyWithMailingListSignup.description: If specified and set to true, the discount is only available for customers who have signed up to the retailer's mailing list.
isOnlyWithMailingListSignup.label: Only For Retailer Mailing List Members

isOnlyWithPaymentCard.description: If specified, the discount is only available when purchasing using one of the specified payment card types.
isOnlyWithPaymentCard.label: Only With Payment Card

isOnlyWithRetailerLoyaltyCard.description: If specified and set to true, the discount is only available for holders of the retailer's own loyalty card.
isOnlyWithRetailerLoyaltyCard.label: Only For Retailer Loyalty Cardholders

isOnlyWithRetailerPaymentCard.description: If specified and set to true, the discount is only available for holders of the retailer's own store payment card.
isOnlyWithRetailerPaymentCard.label: Only For Retailer Payment Cardholders

isPatterned.description: The descriptive term that is used by the product manufacturer to identify whether or not the product has a patterned design.
isPatterned.label: Is Patterned

isPittedStoned.description: The descriptive term that is used by the product manufacturer to identify whether or not a fruit or vegetable product has been de-stoned or pitted prior to being offered for sale.
isPittedStoned.label: Is Pitted Stoned

isProductRecalled.description: An indicator for the product to determine if the Manufacturer or Supplier has recalled the product.
isProductRecalled.label: Is Product Recalled

isPromoterExclusiveOffer.description: Determines whether the offer is only provided by the promoter
isPromoterExclusiveOffer.label: Is Promoter Exclusive Offer

isRindEdible.description: An indicator whether or not the cheese rind is edible. Some cheeses are coated in plastic or their surface is treated with other traditional substances to increase their shelf life. This can result in the rind no longer being edible.
isRindEdible.label: Is Rind Edible

isSeedless.description: Determines whether the product is seedless as grown.
isSeedless.label: Is Seedless

isShelledPeeled.description: The descriptive term that is used by the product manufacturer to identify whether or not the product or its contents have been shelled/peeled prior to being offered for sale.
isShelledPeeled.label: Is Shelled or Peeled

isSliced.description: Determines whether the product comes pre-sliced.
isSliced.label: Is Sliced

isThermal.description: The descriptive term that is used to identify whether the product is thermal.
isThermal.label: Is Thermal

isVintage.description: Identifies whether the product makes claim to being vintage.
isVintage.label: Is Vintage

isWashedReadyToEat.description: Determines whether product has been prewashed and is ready to eat.
isWashedReadyToEat.label: Is Washed Ready To Eat

isWaterproof.description: The descriptive term that is used to identify whether or not the product claims to provide waterproofing to the applied surface.
isWaterproof.label: Is Waterproof

isWearableItemDisposable.description: Identifies whether or not the product is intended to be disposed of after single use or a limited period of use.
isWearableItemDisposable.label: Is Wearable Item Disposable

itemOffered.description: The product included in the offer.
itemOffered.label: Item Offered

juiceContentPercent.description: The fruit juice content of the product expressed as a percentage.
juiceContentPercent.label: Juice Content Percent

jws.description: A link to a JSON Web Signature
jws.label: JSON Web Signature

latitude.description: Angular distance North or South from the earth's equator measured through 90 degrees.
latitude.label: Latitude

leasedFrom.description: Links to the organisation (lessor) from which this place is leased.
leasedFrom.label: Leased from

leasedTo.description: Links to the organisation(s) (lessee(s)) to which this place is leased. Property SHOULD be applied to a specific sub-location, rather than a main location, wherever possible.
leasedTo.label: Leased to

leaveReview.description: A link through which a review can be added.
leaveReview.label: Leave a review

lesseeOf.description: Links to the place(s) for which this organisation is the lessee (i.e., this organisation leases those places from another organisation, the lessor).
lesseeOf.label: Lessee of location

lessorFor.description: Links to the place(s) for which this organisation is the lessor (i.e., this organisation leases those places to others).
lessorFor.label: Lessor for

line.description: A line is a point-to-point path consisting of two or more point objects separated by a space. A single line segment (i.e., straight line) is expressed as two points.  A multi-line path (i.e., open polygon) is expressed as a series of three or more points. For a closed shape, gs1:polygon SHALL be used.
line.label: Line

location.description: The place(s) associated with an organization.
location.label: Has Location

locationGLN.description: 13-digit GLN that is being used to identify a physical or digital location. If gs1:glnType is present, gs1:locationGLN SHALL only be used when gs1:GLN_TypeCode includes FIXED_PHYSICAL_LOCATION, MOBILE_PHYSICAL_LOCATION, or DIGITAL_LOCATION
locationGLN.label: Location GLN

locationHistory.description: Provides details on if and when a location is active or inactive.
locationHistory.label: Has Location History

locationID.description: Identifier value associated to a location. This value SHALL follow rules set forth by the administrating organisation designated in gs1:LocationID_Type.
locationID.label: Location ID

locationID_Qualifier.description: Secondary qualifier to supplement gs1:LocationID_Type meaning. May be used with proprietary ID code values to define identifier administrator.
locationID_Qualifier.label: Location ID Qualifier

locationID_Type.description: Organisation that administers the gs1:locationID or the name of the ID itself.  Value from gs1:LocationID_Type code list.
locationID_Type.label: Location ID

locationID_URI.description: A URI that links to information about the gs1:locationID.
locationID_URI.label: Location ID URI

locationInfo.description: A link to a map, directions, or other location-related information.  For B2B location  information, see gs1:logisticsInfo.  For details specific to hours of operation, see gs1:openingHoursInfo
locationInfo.label: Location information

locationRole.description: A location classification based on the purpose, type of site and/or what occurs there. Repeatable value from gs1:LocationRoleType code list.
locationRole.label: Location Role

locationStatus.description: Designation of active/inactive status of a location.
locationStatus.label: Location Status

logisticsInfo.description: A link to B2B logistics information related to a physical location.
logisticsInfo.label: Logistics information

longitude.description: The arc or portion of the earth's equator intersected between the meridian of a given place and the prime meridian and expressed in degrees
longitude.label: Longitude

magnesiumPerNutrientBasis.description: Magnesium per specified nutrient basis quantity.
magnesiumPerNutrientBasis.label: Magnesium Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

makesOffer.description: An offer made by an organization.
makesOffer.label: Makes Offer

managedBy.description: Links to the organisation that manages this place or organisation, as designated by the owner or another organisation.
managedBy.label: Managed by

managedFor.description: Links to the organisation(s) for whom this place is managed. Property SHOULD be applied to a specific sub-location, rather than a main location, wherever possible.
managedFor.label: Managed for

manages.description: Links to the place(s) or organisation(s) that this organisation manages, on behalf of the owner or another organisation.
manages.label: Manages

manganesePerNutrientBasis.description: Manganese per specified nutrient basis quantity.
manganesePerNutrientBasis.label: Manganese Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

manufacturer.description: The organization that produces the item.
manufacturer.label: Has Manufacturer

manufacturerPreparationCode.description: Code indicating the preparation methods that a manufacturer has used in the manufacturing of a product for example DEEP_FRY.
manufacturerPreparationCode.label: Manufacturer Preparation Code

manufacturersWarranty.description: The warranty associated with the product.
manufacturersWarranty.label: Has Manufacturer's Warranty

manufacturingPlant.description: A physical location consisting of one or more buildings with facilities for manufacturing.
manufacturingPlant.label: Has Manufacturing Plant

massPerUnitArea.description: The mass per unit area of the item. This can be given using a number of different AI ranges that depend on the units in which the mass and area are measured.
massPerUnitArea.label: 337n

masterData.description: A link to a source of structured master data for the entity. This is typically for B2B applications.
masterData.label: Master data

maturationMethod.description: The method of maturity for the item for example tree ripened or jet fresh.
maturationMethod.label: Maturation Method Code

maxPrice.description: Provides a maximum price value as a floating-point numeric value that is qualified by the corresponding currency. See also gs1:priceCurrency
maxPrice.label: Maximum Price

maximumDiscountAmount.description: Links to a gs1:PriceSpecification that indicates in terms of an amount and specified currency, the maximum discount on the sales price associated with a particular gs1:Discount. This property can be used to express 'up to $10 off'.
maximumDiscountAmount.label: Maximum Discount Amount

maximumDiscountPercentage.description: A floating-point value indicating a maximum percentage discount on the sales price associated with a particular gs1:Discount.  This property can be used to express 'up to 15% discount'.
maximumDiscountPercentage.label: Maximum Discount Percentage

maximumOptimumConsumptionTemperature.description: The upper limit drinking temperature of the optimum range of the drinking temperature. The optimum range of the drinking temperature is a recommendation and is based on the experience of the individual producer. Allows for the representation of the same value in different units of measure but not multiple values.
maximumOptimumConsumptionTemperature.label: Maximum Optimum Consumption Temperature

maximumQualifyingItems.description: Specifies the maximum number of items that qualify for a particular gs1:Discount. This property can be used to express 'maximum N items per customer'.
maximumQualifyingItems.label: Maximum Qualifying Items

maximumQualifyingSpend.description: Links to a gs1:PriceSpecification that indicates in terms of an amount and specified currency, the maximum spend that qualifies for a particular gs1:Discount. This property can be used to express 'for purchases of up to $100'.
maximumQualifyingSpend.label: Maximum Qualifying Spend

meatPoultryType.description: The fish, meat, or poultry type for this food and beverage item.
meatPoultryType.label: Meat Poultry Type Code

menuInfo.description: A link to menu details. This may include food menus, services, or other offerings provided by an organisation or at a location.  For details specific to allergens only, see gs1:allergenInfo .  For details specific to nutrition information only, see gs1:nutritionalInfo .  For details specific to ingredients only, see gs1:ingredientsInfo .
menuInfo.label: Menu information

minPrice.description: Provides a minimum price value as a floating-point numeric value that is qualified by the corresponding currency. See also gs1:priceCurrency
minPrice.label: Minimum Price

minimumDiscountAmount.description: Links to a gs1:PriceSpecification that indicates in terms of an amount and specified currency, the minimum discount on the sales price associated with a particular gs1:Discount. This property can be used to express 'at least $10 off'.
minimumDiscountAmount.label: Minimum Discount Amount

minimumDiscountPercentage.description: A floating-point value indicating a minimum percentage discount on the sales price associated with a particular gs1:Discount.  This property can be used to express 'at least 15% discount'.
minimumDiscountPercentage.label: Minimum Discount Percentage

minimumFishContent.description: The minimum amount of fish contained in a food and beverage product expressed as a measurement.
minimumFishContent.label: Minimum Fish Content

minimumMeatPoultryContent.description: The minimum amount of fish, meat or poultry contained in a food and beverage product expressed as a measurement.
minimumMeatPoultryContent.label: Minimum Meat Poultry Content

minimumOptimumConsumptionTemperature.description: The lower limit drinking temperature of the optimum range of the drinking temperature. The optimum range of the drinking temperature is a recommendation and is based on the experience of the individual producer. Allows for the representation of the same value in different units of measure but not multiple values.
minimumOptimumConsumptionTemperature.label: Minimum Optimum Consumption Temperature

minimumQualifyingItems.description: Specifies the minimum number of items that must be purchased to qualify for a particular gs1:Discount. This property can be used to express 'if you buy at least N items'.
minimumQualifyingItems.label: Minimum Qualifying Items

minimumQualifyingSpend.description: Links to a gs1:PriceSpecification that indicates in terms of an amount and specified currency, the minimum spend required to qualify for a particular gs1:Discount. This property can be used to express 'if you spend at least $100'.
minimumQualifyingSpend.label: Minimum Qualifying Spend

molybdenumPerNutrientBasis.description: Molybdenum per specified nutrient basis quantity.
molybdenumPerNutrientBasis.label: Molybdenum Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

monounsaturatedFatPerNutrientBasis.description: Monounsaturated fat per specified nutrient basis quantity.
monounsaturatedFatPerNutrientBasis.label: Monounsaturated Fat Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

netArea.description: The net area of the item. This can be given using a number of different AI ranges that depend on the units in which the area is measured.
netArea.label: 314n, 350n, 351n

netContent.description: The quantity of the product contained by a package, usually as claimed on the label. Indicates the net content of the total product. For fixed value products use the value claimed on the package, to avoid variable fill rate issue that arises with some product which are sold by volume or weight, and whose actual content may vary slightly from batch to batch.
netContent.label: 360n, 361n, 364n, 365n, 366n

netWeight.description: Used to identify the net weight of the product. Net Weight excludes all packaging material, including the packaging material of all lower-level GTINs. Example:11.5 kgm.
netWeight.label: 310n, 320n, 356n, 357n

niacinPerNutrientBasis.description: Niacin per specified nutrient basis quantity.
niacinPerNutrientBasis.label: Niacin Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

numberOfServingsPerPackage.description: The total number of servings contained in the package.
numberOfServingsPerPackage.label: Number of Servings Per Package

numberOfServingsPerPackageMeasurementPre.description: Code indicating whether the number of servings per package is exact or approximate.
numberOfServingsPerPackageMeasurementPre.label: Number of Servings Per Package Measurement Precision

numberOfServingsRangeDescription.description: A free text field specifying a range for the number of servings contained in the package.
numberOfServingsRangeDescription.label: Number of Servings Range Description

nutrientBasisQuantity.description: Quantity on which the nutrient information has been based; for example, per 100 grams. When specified, nutrientBasisQuantity establishes the basis for all contained nutrient records.
nutrientBasisQuantity.label: Nutrient Basis Quantity

nutrientBasisQuantityType.description: The type of quantity specified in the nutrientBasisQuantity for example measurement, serving size, or container. This is used in conjunction with the nutrientBasisQuantity.
nutrientBasisQuantityType.label: Nutrient Basis Quantity Type Code

nutrientMeasurementPrecision.description: The Code indicating whether the specified nutrient content is exact or approximate.
nutrientMeasurementPrecision.label: Nutrient Measurement Precision

nutritionalClaim.description: Code indicating a nutritional claim applicable to the product, for example FAT_FREE.
nutritionalClaim.label: Nutritional Claim Code

nutritionalClaimStatement.description: Free text field for any additional nutritional claims.
nutritionalClaimStatement.label: Nutritional Claim Statement

occupiedBy.description: Links to the organisation(s) that occupy this place. Property SHOULD be applied to a specific sub-location, rather than a main location, wherever possible.
occupiedBy.label: Occupied by

occupies.description: Links to the place(s) that this organisation occupies.
occupies.label: Occupies location

offerDescription.description: A description of the offer including goods or services offered for sale or use.
offerDescription.label: Offer Description

offerDiscount.description: A discount associated with an offer.
offerDiscount.label: Offer Discount

offerRedemptionType.description: A code indicating the type of redemptions that apply to the offer, for example single use.
offerRedemptionType.label: Offer Redemption Type

offerRedemptionURL.description: The URL where the offer seeker will need to go in order to redeem the offer for an online redemption.
offerRedemptionURL.label: Offer Redemption URL

offerRestrictionDescription.description: A description of what the offer is restricted to, relative to all other offerings by the issuer, for example payment restrictions, subscription required, new customers only.
offerRestrictionDescription.label: Offer Restriction Description

openingHoursInfo.description: A link to details on hours of operation.
openingHoursInfo.label: Opening hours information

organicClaim.description: Relates to an organic claim about the product
organicClaim.label: Has Organic Claim

organicClaimAgency.description: A governing body that creates and maintains standards related to organic products.
organicClaimAgency.label: Organic Claim Agency Code

organicPercentClaim.description: The percent of actual organic materials per weight of the product. This is usually claimed on the product.
organicPercentClaim.label: Organic Percent Claim

organizationHistory.description: Provides details on if and when an organisation/party is active or inactive.
organizationHistory.label: Has Organization History

organizationID.description: Identifier value associated to an organisation/party. This value SHALL follow rules set forth by the administrating organisation designated in gs1:OrganizationID_Type.
organizationID.label: Organisation ID

organizationID_Qualifier.description: Secondary qualifier to supplement gs1:organizationID_Type meaning. May be used with proprietary ID code values to define identifier administrator.
organizationID_Qualifier.label: Organisation ID Qualifier

organizationID_Type.description: Organisation that administers the gs1:organizationID or the name of the ID itself.  Value from gs1:OrganizationID_Type code list.
organizationID_Type.label: Organisation ID

organizationID_URI.description: A URI that links to information about the gs1:organizationID.
organizationID_URI.label: Organisation ID URI

organizationName.description: The name of the organization expressed in text.
organizationName.label: Organization Name

organizationRole.description: The role and/or purpose of a party (i.e. legal entity or function).  Multiple values from gs1:OrganizationRoleType code list may be associated to a single organisation/party.
organizationRole.label: Has Organization Role

organizationStatus.description: Designation of active/inactive status of an organisation/party.
organizationStatus.label: Organisation Status

outOfPackageDepth.description: The depth of the product out of its packaging, as measured according to the GS1 Package Measurement Rules. See https://www.gs1.org/package-measurement-rules-implementation-guide for more details.
outOfPackageDepth.label: Out of Package Depth

outOfPackageDiameter.description: The measurement of the diameter of the product out of its package at its largest point. For example, 165 MMT.
outOfPackageDiameter.label: Out of Package Diameter

outOfPackageHeight.description: The height of the product out of the package, as measured according to the GS1 Package Measurement Rules. See https://www.gs1.org/package-measurement-rules-implementation-guide for more details.
outOfPackageHeight.label: Out of Package Height

outOfPackageWidth.description: The width of the product out of the package, as measured according to the GS1 Package Measurement Rules. See https://www.gs1.org/package-measurement-rules-implementation-guide for more details.
outOfPackageWidth.label: Out of Package Width

ownedBy.description: Links to the organisation(s) that own this place, in full or in part. This includes joint ventures. For leased locations, see gs1:lessorFor and gs1:isLeasedFrom.
ownedBy.label: Owned by

owns.description: Links to the place(s) or organisation(s) that this organisation owns.
owns.label: Owns

packaging.description: Details on the packaging for a product including type, weight and materials.
packaging.label: Has Packaging

packagingDate.description: The packaging date is the date when the goods were packed as determined by the packager. The date may refer to the trade item itself or to items contained.

packagingFeature.description: Code indicating a feature that facilitates the usage of the product by the consumer, for example a handle. Packaging features do not affect the core composition of the packaging type nor modify its usage.
packagingFeature.label: Packaging Feature

packagingFunction.description: Code indicating specific functionality for packaging resulting from specific processes or features present in the packaging type,for example, ANTI_TAMPERING.
packagingFunction.label: Packaging Function

packagingMarkedDietAllergenType.description: Indication of which dietary or allergen marks are on the package.
packagingMarkedDietAllergenType.label: Packaging Marked Diet Allergen Type Code

packagingMarkedFreeFrom.description: Indication of the food ingredients that the package is marked free from.
packagingMarkedFreeFrom.label: Packaging Marked Free From Code

packagingMarkedLabelAccreditation.description: A marking that the product received recognition, endorsement, certification by following guidelines by the label issuing agency. This does not represent claims for regulatory purposes on products such as free from markings.
packagingMarkedLabelAccreditation.label: Accreditation Code

packagingMaterial.description: links to details about packaging material type, quantity and thickness
packagingMaterial.label: Has Packaging Material Details

packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity.description: The quantity of the packaging material of the product. Can be weight, volume or surface, can vary by country.
packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity.label: Packaging Material Composition Quantity

packagingMaterialThickness.description: The thickness of a packaging material.
packagingMaterialThickness.label: Packaging Material Thickness

packagingMaterialType.description: The materials used for the packaging of the product for example glass or plastic.
packagingMaterialType.label: Packaging Material Type

packagingRecyclingProcessType.description: The process the packaging could undertake for recyclable & sustainability programs. Examples COMPOSTABLE, ENERGY_RECOVERABLE, REUSABLE.
packagingRecyclingProcessType.label: Packaging Recycling Process Type

packagingRecyclingScheme.description: A code indicating the recycling scheme the packaging of this product will fall within when recycled. Applies to recyclable packaging with or without deposit.
packagingRecyclingScheme.label: Packaging Recycling Scheme

packagingShape.description: A code depicting the shape of a package for example CONE.
packagingShape.label: Packaging Shape
