packagingType.description: The dominant means used to transport, store, handle or display the product as defined by the data source. This packaging is not used to describe any manufacturing process.Recommend to use UNECE Rec 21 codes.
packagingType.label: Packaging Type

pantothenicAcidPerNutrientBasis.description: Pantothenic Acid per specified nutrient basis quantity.
pantothenicAcidPerNutrientBasis.label: Pantothenic Acid Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

parentOrganization.description: Designates the legal entity or function directly above the organisation/party being identified in a hierarchy. This is not defaulted to the highest-level entity in the hierarchy. Only one parent organisation SHALL be associated to a single GLN. To specify other affiliated organisations, see gs1:affiliatedTo, gs1:managedBy, gs1:franchiseeOf, gs1:ownedBy. To specify an organisation/party lower in the hierarchy, see gs1:subOrganization.
parentOrganization.label: Parent Organization

partyGLN.description: 13-digit GLN that is being used to identify a legal entity or function. If gs1:glnType is present, gs1:partyGLN SHALL only be used when gs1:GLN_TypeCode includes LEGAL_ENTITY and/or FUNCTION
partyGLN.label: Party GLN

paymentLink.description: A link to a place where payments details are provided and/or payments can be made by the user.
paymentLink.label: Make Payment

paymentTerms.description: The type of payment term expressed as a code, for example Discount.
paymentTerms.label: Payment Terms

percentageOfAlcoholByVolume.description: The percentage of alcohol contained in product.
percentageOfAlcoholByVolume.label: Percentage of Alcohol Per Volume

phosphorusPerNutrientBasis.description: Phosphorus per specified nutrient basis quantity.
phosphorusPerNutrientBasis.label: Phosphorus Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

physicalLocationName.description: The name of a physical place. To specify the name of a digital location, see gs1:digitalLocationName.
physicalLocationName.label: Physical Location Name

pip.description: A link to information specifically about the identified item, typically operated by the brand owner or a retailer of the product and aimed at consumers. It may include links to further information, product description, specifications etc.
pip.label: Product Information Page

polygon.description: A polygon is the area enclosed by a point-to-point path for which the starting and ending points are the same. A polygon is expressed as a series of four or more space delimited points where the first and final points are identical.
polygon.label: Polygon

polyolsPerNutrientBasis.description: Polyols per specified nutrient basis quantity.
polyolsPerNutrientBasis.label: Polyols Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

polyunsaturatedFatPerNutrientBasis.description: Polyunsaturated fat per specified nutrient basis quantity.
polyunsaturatedFatPerNutrientBasis.label: Polyunsaturated Fat Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

postOfficeBoxNumber.description: The number that identifies a PO box. A PO box is a box in a post office or other postal service location assigned to an organization where postal items may be kept.
postOfficeBoxNumber.label: PO Box Number

postalCode.description: Text specifying the postal code for an address.
postalCode.label: Postal Code

postalName.description: The name of the recipient expressed in text. Note that this may be different than gs1:OrganizationName.
postalName.label: Postal Name

potassiumPerNutrientBasis.description: Potassium per specified nutrient basis quantity.
potassiumPerNutrientBasis.label: Potassium Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

preparationCode.description: Code specifying the preparation state of the product for which the nutrient information is valid. PREPARED, UNPREPARED.
preparationCode.label: Preparation Type Code

preparationConsumptionPrecautions.description: Specifies additional precautions to be taken before preparation or consumption of the product.
preparationConsumptionPrecautions.label: Preparation Consumption Precautions

preparationInformation.description: Links to information about how to prepare a specific Food/Beverage/Tobacco product.
preparationInformation.label: Has Food And Beverage Preparation Information

preparationInstructions.description: Free text providing instructions on how to prepare the product before serving.
preparationInstructions.label: Preparation Instructions

preservationTechnique.description: Code indicating the preservation technique used to preserve the product from deterioration, for example, BRINING.
preservationTechnique.label: Preservation Technique

price.description: Provides a price value as a floating-point numeric value that is qualified by the corresponding currency. See also gs1:priceCurrency. The price value indicates the unit price unless the property gs1:eligibleQuantity is specified and indicates multiple units
price.label: Price Value

priceSpecification.description: The price related to an offer. If the offer is a multi-buy offer for a quantity of product greater than one unit, this should be indicated using the property gs1:eligibleQuantity
priceSpecification.label: Price Specification

primaryAlternateProduct.description: A product that is similar to the current product but is not exact match. Same form fit function, e.g. same product different colour, different package size, better quality.
primaryAlternateProduct.label: Has Primary Alternate Product

primaryLocationOf.description: Links to the organisation(s) that designate this place as its/their primary location. Property SHOULD be applied to a specific sub-location, rather than a main location, wherever possible.
primaryLocationOf.label: Primary location of

productDescription.description: An understandable and useable description of a product using brand and other descriptors. This attribute is filled with as little abbreviation as possible, while keeping to a reasonable length.  This should be a meaningful description of the product with full spelling to facilitate message processing. Retailers can use this description as the base to fully understand the brand, flavour, scent etc. of the specific product, in order to accurately create a product description as needed for their internal systems. Examples: XYZ Brand Base Invisible Solid Deodorant AP Stick Spring Breeze.
productDescription.label: Product Description

productFeatureBenefit.description: Element for consumer facing marketing content to describe the key features or benefits of the style suitable for display purposes.
productFeatureBenefit.label: Product Feature Benefit

productFormDescription.description: The physical form or shape of the product. Used, for example, in pharmaceutical industry to indicate the formulation of the product. Defines the form the product takes and is distinct from the form of the packaging.
productFormDescription.label: Product Form Description

productID.description: Additional means to the Global Trade Item Number to identify a product.
productID.label: Product ID

productMarketingMessage.description: Marketing message associated with the product. Consumer-friendly marketing detailed description of the product.
productMarketingMessage.label: Product Marketing Message

productName.description: Consumer friendly short description of the product suitable for compact presentation.
productName.label: Product Name

productRange.description: A name, used by a Brand Owner, that span multiple consumer categories or uses. E.g. (Waist Watchers).
productRange.label: Product Range

productSustainabilityInfo.description: This term has been deprecated. Please use gs1:sustainabilityInfo instead.
productSustainabilityInfo.label: Sustainability and recycling (deprecated)

productYield.description: Product quantity after preparation. This can differ based on productYieldType
productYield.label: Product Yield

productYieldType.description: Code indicating the type of yield measurement specified in productYield. Examples: AFTER_DILUTION, DRAINED_WEIGHT.
productYieldType.label: Product Yield Type Code

productYieldVariationPercentage.description: Indication of range in percent of the given cooking / roasting loss. Percentage that the actual weight of the product differs upward or downward from the average or estimated product yield.
productYieldVariationPercentage.label: Product Yield Variation Percentage

productionDate.description: The production date is the production or assembly date determined by the manufacturer. The date may refer to the trade item itself or to items contained.

productionDateTime.description: The date and time of production (or assembly). The date and time of production is determined by the manufacturer. The date and time may refer to the trade item itself or to the items contained.

productionVariantDescription.description: Free text assigned by the manufacturer to describe the production variant. Examples are: package series X, package series Y.
productionVariantDescription.label: Production Variant Description

productionVariantEffectiveDateTime.description: The start date of a production variant. The variant applies to products having a date mark (a best before date or expiration date) on the package that comes on or after the effective date.
productionVariantEffectiveDateTime.label: Production Variant Effective Date Time

proteinPerNutrientBasis.description: Protein per specified nutrient basis quantity.
proteinPerNutrientBasis.label: Protein Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

provenanceStatement.description: Free text description of the region or place the product originates from. This is to be specifically used to specify areas such as cities, mountain ranges, regions. Examples: Made in the Thuringen Mountains, Made in Paris, From the Napa Valley.
provenanceStatement.label: Provenance Statement

purchaseSuppliesOrAccessories.description: A link to information about where supplies or accessories for the item can be purchased or ordered.
purchaseSuppliesOrAccessories.label: Purchase supplies or accessories

qualifyingBrandName.description: If specified, the discount is only available when purchasing a product from one of the brand names specified via this property.
qualifyingBrandName.label: Qualifying Brand Name

qualifyingGPCs.description: If specified, the discount is only available when purchasing a product whose Global Product Classification (GPC) brick value appears in the list specified via this property.
qualifyingGPCs.label: Qualifying Product GPC codes

qualifyingProductCategoryDescription.description: If specified, the discount is only available when purchasing a product from categories specified in this free-form text field.
qualifyingProductCategoryDescription.label: Qualifying Product Category Description

qualifyingProductClassificationCode.description: If specified, the discount is only available when purchasing a product whose product classification (other than GPC) appears in the list specified via this property. This property specifies a product classification other than GPC.
qualifyingProductClassificationCode.label: Qualifying Product Classification Code

qualifyingProductGTINs.description: If specified, the discount is only available when purchasing a product whose GTIN appears in the list specified via this property.
qualifyingProductGTINs.label: Qualifying Product GTINs

qualifyingSubBrandName.description: If specified, the discount is only available when purchasing a product from one of the sub-brand names (specified product ranges for a given brand) specified via this property.
qualifyingSubBrandName.label: Qualifying Sub-brand Name

quickStartGuide.description: A link to a description of the key features needed to be understood to begin using the item or interacting with something new.
quickStartGuide.label: Quick start guide

recallStatus.description: A link to information about whether the product has been recalled or not, typically an API.
recallStatus.label: Recall status

recipeInfo.description: A link to a recipe website.
recipeInfo.label: Recipe website

referencedFile.description: Link to a file or website containing additional information on product.
referencedFile.label: Has Referenced File

referencedFileEffectiveEndDateTime.description: The date upon which the target of this external link ceases to be effective for use.
referencedFileEffectiveEndDateTime.label: Referenced File Effective End Date

referencedFileEffectiveStartDateTime.description: The date upon which the target of this external link begins to be effective for use.
referencedFileEffectiveStartDateTime.label: Referenced File Effective Start Date

referencedFileSize.description: The size of the file as it is stored in an uncompressed format.
referencedFileSize.label: Referenced File Size

referencedFileType.description: A code indicating the purpose or role of file (not a MIME type) that is being referenced, for example PRODUCT_LABEL_IMAGE. This code is used when the purpose of a file is not specified in the property.
referencedFileType.label: Referenced File Type

referencedFileURL.description: Simple text string that refers to a resource on the internet, URLs may refer to documents, resources, people, etc.
referencedFileURL.label: Website

registerProduct.description: A link to an entry point for registering ownership of a product including for warranty purposes.
registerProduct.label: Register purchase

registryEntry.description: A link to an entry in a register, such as a business register or register of locations. Such registers may act as alternative identifiers, such as official company numbers, LEIs, other location identifiers etc.
registryEntry.label: Entry in a register

regulatedProductName.description: The prescribed, regulated or generic product name or denomination that describes the true nature of the product. For example for a food product in order to distinguish it from other foods according to country specific regulations.
regulatedProductName.label: Regulated Product Name

reheatingClaim.description: Indicates, with reference to the product branding, labelling or packaging whether a food product which is ready to eat can be reheated if required prior to consumption.
reheatingClaim.label: Reheating Claim

relatedOrganization.description: The organisation(s) associated with a place.
relatedOrganization.label: Has Organisation

relatedVideo.description: A link to any video, or document that has an embedded video, that describes or relates to the identified item, organisation, or location in some way.
relatedVideo.label: Related  video

replacedByOrganization.description: Links to the successor organisation that is used in place of a previous organisation
replacedByOrganization.label: Replaced by organization

replacedByPlace.description: Links to the successor location that is used in place of a previous location
replacedByPlace.label: Replaced by Place

replacedByProduct.description: The product which permanently replaces the current product. This product is sent in the record for the original item that is being replaced.
replacedByProduct.label: Has Replaced By Product

replacedOrganization.description: Links to the previous organisation that this organisation replaces
replacedOrganization.label: Replaced organization

replacedPlace.description: Links to the previous location that this location replaces
replacedPlace.label: Replaced Place

replacedProduct.description: Indicates the product identification of an item that is being permanently replaced by this product.
replacedProduct.label: Has Replaced Product

responsibility.description: Text further specifying the area of responsibility of the trade contact.
responsibility.label: Responsibility

responsibleForLocation.description: Links to the place(s) for which this organisation is responsible.
responsibleForLocation.label: Responsible for location

responsibleOrganization.description: Links to the organisation that is directly responsible for this place.
responsibleOrganization.label: Organisation responsible for the location

returnablePackageDepositAmount.description: The monetary amount for the individual returnable package.
returnablePackageDepositAmount.label: Returnable Package Deposit Amount

returnablePackageDepositRegion.description: The geographic region associated with the returnable package deposit amount.
returnablePackageDepositRegion.label: Returnable Package Deposit Region

riboflavinPerNutrientBasis.description: Riboflavin per specified nutrient basis quantity.
riboflavinPerNutrientBasis.label: Riboflavin Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

saltPerNutrientBasis.description: Salt per specified nutrient basis quantity.
saltPerNutrientBasis.label: Salt Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

saturatedFatPerNutrientBasis.description: Saturated fat per specified nutrient basis quantity.
saturatedFatPerNutrientBasis.label: Saturated Fat Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

scheduleTime.description: A link to a site that offers information on scheduling, appointments, or reservations. This may or may not allow the user to book the reservation.
scheduleTime.label: Scheduling/Reservation

seasonCalendarYear.description: The calendar year in which the product is seasonally available.
seasonCalendarYear.label: Season Calendar Year

seasonName.description: Element defines the season applicable to the item for example Winter.
seasonName.label: Season Name

seasonParameter.description: Code indicating the season in which the product is available, e.g. SPRING, WINTER
seasonParameter.label: Season Parameter

selectedProductsOnly.description: If specified and set to true, the discount only applies to specific products selected by the retailer or offer promoter - not to all items in that product category.  This property should be asserted and set to true for offers that say 'on selected products'.
selectedProductsOnly.label: Selected Products Only

seleniumPerNutrientBasis.description: Selenium per specified nutrient basis quantity.
seleniumPerNutrientBasis.label: Selenium Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

sellByDate.description: The date specified by the manufacturer as the last date the retailer is to offer the product for sale to the consumer. The product should not be merchandised after this date.

seller.description: The organization seeking to sell a product or service.
seller.label: Seller

serviceInfo.description: A link to service or maintenance instructions.
serviceInfo.label: Service information

servingSize.description: Measurement value specifying the serving size in which the information per nutrient has been stated. Example: Per 100 GRM.
servingSize.label: Serving Size

servingSizeDescription.description: A free text field specifying the serving size for which the nutrient information has been stated for example: per 1/3 cup (42 g).
servingSizeDescription.label: Serving Size Description

servingSuggestion.description: Free text field for serving suggestion.
servingSuggestion.label: Serving Suggestion

sharpnessOfCheese.description: The descriptive term that is used by the product manufacturer to identify the sharpness of the taste of the product for example EXTRA_SHARP. Usually the longer the aging of the product, the sharper the taste.
sharpnessOfCheese.label: Sharpness Of Cheese

size.description: Links a wearable product to one or more groupings of gs1:SizeDetails representing size systems, size groups, size type and size dimensions.
size.label: Size

sizeCode.description: Links a product to one or more groupings of gs1:SizeCodeDetails representing the size value from a specified code list.
sizeCode.label: Size Code

sizeCodeListCode.description: Code specifying a size code list. Allowed code values are specified in GS1 Code List SizeCodeListCode .
sizeCodeListCode.label: Size Code List Code

sizeCodeValue.description: A code indicating the size of an object according to a specific code list. The applied code list is specified as additional information together with the size code.
sizeCodeValue.label: Size Code

sizeDimension.description: The numerical size measurement relating to the size type.
sizeDimension.label: Size Dimension

sizeGroup.description: Code indicating the type of size that is necessary to uniquely specify the size of the item, for example, BOYS.
sizeGroup.label: Size Group

sizeSystem.description: The system that is being used to define the size for example EUROPE. Size system is used in conjunction with size group to define the size dimension.
sizeSystem.label: Size System

sizeType.description: The type of size dimension being specified for example SLEEVE.
sizeType.label: Size Type

smartLabel.description: A link to the product's SmartLabel page.
smartLabel.label: SmartLabel

smpc.description: A link to Summary Product Characteristics. To be used specifically when linking to information for healthcare professionals.
smpc.label: Summary Product Characteristics (SmPC)

socialMedia.description: A link to a social media channel. The title will typically be replaced by the name of the channel.
socialMedia.label: Social media

sodiumPerNutrientBasis.description: Sodium per specified nutrient basis quantity.
sodiumPerNutrientBasis.label: Sodium Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

sourceAnimal.description: Code indicating the source of raw material used to produce the food product, for example a GOAT for milk.
sourceAnimal.label: Source Animal Code

sportingActivityType.description: Code indicating the type of sporting activity for which the product is intended to be worn, for example FOOTBALL.
sportingActivityType.label: Sporting Activity Type

starchPerNutrientBasis.description: Starch per specified nutrient basis quantity.
starchPerNutrientBasis.label: Starch Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

statisticInfo.description: A link to information about statistics regarding an organisation, location, or other entity.
statisticInfo.label: Statistics

statusTimestamp.description: Date and time (including optional timezone) associated to status designations. Timestamps may be future dated to provide advance notice of status changes. For further information about the required lexical representation of date, time, and timezone please see https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#dateTime
statusTimestamp.label: Status Timestamp

streetAddress.description: The street address expressed as free form text. The street address is printed on paper as the first lines below the name. For example, the name of the street and the number in the street or the name of a building. A total of four street address lines are available. gs1:streetAddress SHOULD be used before populating lines two through four. For a PO Box gs1:postOfficeBoxNumber SHOULD be used instead.
streetAddress.label: Street Address

streetAddressLine2.description: The second line of the street address, expressed as free form text. The street address is printed on paper as the first lines below the name. For example, the name of the street and the number in the street or the name of a building. A total of four street address lines are available. gs1:streetAddress SHOULD be used before populating lines two through four. These SHALL NOT be used as alternatives to the dedicated address properties gs1:addressSuburb, gs1:addressLocality and gs1:addressRegion.
streetAddressLine2.label: Street Address Line 2

streetAddressLine3.description: The third line of the street address, expressed as free form text. The street address is printed on paper as the first lines below the name. For example, the name of the street and the number in the street or the name of a building. A total of four street address lines are available. gs1:streetAddress and gs1:streetaddressLine2 SHOULD be used before populating lines three and four. These SHALL NOT be used as alternatives to the dedicated address properties gs1:addressSuburb, gs1:addressLocality and gs1:addressRegion.
streetAddressLine3.label: Street Address Line 3

streetAddressLine4.description: The fourth line of the street address, expressed as free form text. The street address is printed on paper as the first lines below the name. For example, the name of the street and the number in the street or the name of a building. gs1:streetAddress, gs1:streetaddressLine2 and gs1:streetaddressLine3 SHOULD be used before populating line four. These SHALL NOT be used as alternatives to the dedicated address properties gs1:addressSuburb, gs1:addressLocality and gs1:addressRegion.
streetAddressLine4.label: Street Address Line 4

styleDescription.description: An attribute that classifies products that share many of the same characteristics (attribute values) that does NOT vary by GTIN, and are presented by the supplier as a single merchandise selection for the buyer.
styleDescription.label: Style Description

subBrandName.description: Second level of brand. Can be a trademark. It is the primary differentiating factor that a brand owner wants to communicate to the consumer or buyer. E.g. Yummy-Cola Classic. In this example Yummy-Cola is the brand and Classic is the sub-brand.
subBrandName.label: Sub-brand Name

subOrganization.description: Designates a legal entity or function directly below the organisation/party being identified in a hierarchy. There may be multiple sub-organisations associated to a single GLN. To specify other affiliated organisations, see gs1:manages, gs1:franchisorOf, gs1:owns. To specify a parent organisation, see gs1:parentOrganization.
subOrganization.label: Sub-Organization

sugarsPerNutrientBasis.description: Sugars per specified nutrient basis quantity.
sugarsPerNutrientBasis.label: Sugars Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

supplierSpecifiedMinimumConsumerStorageD.description: Represents the number of days between a product's sell by date and its use by date.
supplierSpecifiedMinimumConsumerStorageD.label: Supplier Specified Minimum Consumer Storage Days

support.description: A link to a source of support such as a helpdesk, chat support, email etc.
support.label: Support

sustainabilityInfo.description: A link to information relating to sustainability and recycling requirements or processes.
sustainabilityInfo.label: Sustainability and recycling

targetConsumerAge.description: Identifies the target consumer age range for which a product has been designed.
targetConsumerAge.label: Target Consumer Age

targetConsumerGender.description: Identifies the target consumer gender for which a product has been designed for example MALE
targetConsumerGender.label: Target Consumer Gender

targetMarket.description: Relates to a set of target market details (product release date and associated countries)
targetMarket.label: Has Target Market

targetMarketCountries.description: List of countries representing the target market for a particular release date indicated by gs1:consumerFirstAvailabilityDateTime
targetMarketCountries.label: Target Market Countries

textileMaterial.description: One or more links to information about the materials used in a wearable product.
textileMaterial.label: Has Textile Material

textileMaterialContent.description: A description of the material composition used in conjunction with the material percentage.
textileMaterialContent.label: Textile Material Content

textileMaterialDescription.description: This provides a name or brief description of one material contained within the product, for example Rayon.
textileMaterialDescription.label: Textile Description

textileMaterialPercentage.description: Corresponding net weight percentage of the product material specified via gs1:textileMaterialDescription, e.g. 70.
textileMaterialPercentage.label: Textile Material Percentage

textileMaterialThreadCount.description: The quality of material (fabric) of a product based on the total number of vertical and horizontal threads in one square inch.
textileMaterialThreadCount.label: Textile Material Thread Count

textileMaterialWeight.description: The measured weight of the material expressed in ounces per square yard or grams per square meter.
textileMaterialWeight.label: Textile Material Weight

thiaminPerNutrientBasis.description: Thiamin per specified nutrient basis quantity.
thiaminPerNutrientBasis.label: Thiamin Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

traceability.description: A link to traceability information (includes track and trace).  Traceability information may be provided for consumption by humans or computers. If the target is an EPCIS repository, use gs1:epcis instead.
traceability.label: Traceability information

transFatPerNutrientBasis.description: Trans Fat per specified nutrient basis quantity.
transFatPerNutrientBasis.label: Trans Fat Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

tutorial.description: A link to a tutorial or set of tutorials, such as online classes, how-to videos etc.
tutorial.label: Tutorial

unitCode.description: A string value indicating a Measurement Unit from UN/ECE Recommendation 20, Units of Measure used in International Trade e.g. GRM = gram - see http://www.unece.org/fileadmin/DAM/cefact/recommendations/rec20/rec20_rev3_Annex3e.pdf
unitCode.label: Measurement Unit

upperMaterialType.description: The material(s) used for the upper part of the footwear product. The upper is the part of a shoe, boot, slipper or other item of footwear that is above the sole.
upperMaterialType.label: Has Upper Material

userAgreement.description: A link to an agreement or waiver.
userAgreement.label: Sign waiver/agreement/document

usesManagedLocation.description: Links to the place(s) that this organisation uses as a managed space.
usesManagedLocation.label: Uses managed location

validFrom.description: The effective start date of the price .
validFrom.label: Valid From

validThrough.description: The effective end date of the price .
validThrough.label: Valid Through

value.description: A floating-point numeric value that is qualified by the corresponding measurement unit code - see gs1:unitCode
value.label: Measurement Value

variantDescription.description: Free text field used to identify the variant of the product. Variants are the distinguishing characteristics that differentiate products with the same brand and size including such things as the particular flavour, fragrance, taste.
variantDescription.label: Variant Description

verificationService.description: A link to a GS1 Lightweight Messaging Service for verifying the status of a product, organisation, or location and its identifier.
verificationService.label: Verification Service

vintner.description: The person hired by a winery or wine company who is responsible for many of the processes in the preparation, taste and quality of the wine produced. The science of wine making is referred to as oenology. The vintner is the oenologist.
vintner.label: Vintner

vitaminAPerNutrientBasis.description: Vitamin A per specified nutrient basis quantity.
vitaminAPerNutrientBasis.label: Vitamin A Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

vitaminB12PerNutrientBasis.description: Vitamin B12 per specified nutrient basis quantity.
vitaminB12PerNutrientBasis.label: Vitamin B12 Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

vitaminB6PerNutrientBasis.description: Vitamin B6 per specified nutrient basis quantity.
vitaminB6PerNutrientBasis.label: Vitamin B6 Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

vitaminCPerNutrientBasis.description: Vitamin C per specified nutrient basis quantity.
vitaminCPerNutrientBasis.label: Vitamin C Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

vitaminDPerNutrientBasis.description: Vitamin D per specified nutrient basis quantity.
vitaminDPerNutrientBasis.label: Vitamin D Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

vitaminEPerNutrientBasis.description: Vitamin E per specified nutrient basis quantity.
vitaminEPerNutrientBasis.label: Vitamin E Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

vitaminKPerNutrientBasis.description: Vitamin K per specified nutrient basis quantity.
vitaminKPerNutrientBasis.label: Vitamin K Per Nutrient Basis Quantity

warningCopyDescription.description: Warning information is additional information that outlines special requirements, warning and caution information printed on the package.
warningCopyDescription.label: Warning Copy Description

warranty.description: The warranty associated with the product, as provided by the manufacturer.
warranty.label: Has Offer Warranty

warrantyScopeDescription.description: The description of warranty available for the product. Allows for the representation of the same value in different languages but not for multiple values.
warrantyScopeDescription.label: Warranty Scope

whatsInTheBox.description: A link to a description of all the individual items in a packaged item.
whatsInTheBox.label: What's in the box?

zincPerNutrientBasis.description: Zinc per specified nutrient basis quantity.
zincPerNutrientBasis.label: Zinc Per Nutrient Basis Quantity
